dict.acceptation: （男）警察，警员；看守矿井的人；[化] 淀帚；

sent.orig: This old policeman has worked as a policeman for 30 years.
sent.trans: 这位老警察的警龄已有30年。

sent.orig: A. She's a policeman. B. He's a policeman.
sent.trans: 你指着你哥哥的照片说他是一名警察，该怎么说？

sent.orig: The thief has been shadowed by the plain-clothed policeman for a long time.
sent.trans: 便衣跟梢那个小偷很久了。

sent.orig: He was confronted by a policeman at the gate.
sent.trans: 他在大门口碰到了警察。

sent.orig: No policeman ought to be remiss in his duties.
